DOC.brief_summary: The investigators designed a prospective randomized study to investigate the efficacy of intravenous (IV) preemptive versus preventive paracetamol on postoperative pain scores, patient satisfaction, total morphine consumption and the incidence of morphineâ€‘related side effects in patients undergoing cesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: Preemptive and Preventive Use of Paracetamol for Pain Relief After Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: 38 weeks pregnancy, elective cesarean section. morbid obesity, cardiac failure, depression.
